title: paahimaam sree
sahitya:
pAhi mAm shrI rAmacandra pAhi mAm shrI rAma

caraNam 1

 akkaratO pAdamulaku mrokkiti Ela parAku
   
caraNam 2

 dikku nIvE uNDaganu grakkuna vEDukonnAnu
   
caraNam 3

 makkuvatO rAma nIvu ekkuva jEsi nannu brOvu
   
caraNam 4

 cakkani nI muddu mOmu okka sAri kanipimpumu
   
caraNam 5

 anniTanu nelakonna ninnu mincina vArevaranna
   
caraNam 6

 cinnanADE anusarincu konnavADanu nannu pAlincu
   
caraNam 7

 pannaga bhUSaNuDu cAla ninnu koniyADu nE vELa
   
caraNam 8

 mannana jEsi Elavayya Apanna rakSaka rAmayya
   
caraNam 9

 pannuga shrI tyAgarAja sannuta bhAskara tEja
